1.invocation: Scan all the files located at the path/ti/files/ file-system directory using the watch1 watch defined in Xray.

2.invocation: Scan all the files located at the path/ti/files/ file-system directory using the watch1 and watch2 watches defined in Xray.

3.invocation: Scan all the zip files located at the path/ti/files/ file-system directory using the watch1 and watch2 watches defined in Xray.

4.invocation: Scan all the tgz files located at the path/ti/files/ file-system directory using the policies defined for project-1.

5.invocation: Scans all the tgz files located in the current directory using the policies defined for the libs-local/release-artifacts/ path in Artifactory.

6.invocation: Scans all the tgz files located at the current directory. Show all known vulnerabilities, regardless of the policies defined in Xray.
